front.title: Reporting Metrics: Different Points of View

abstract.t: Consumers of IP network performance metrics have many different usesin mind. This memo categorizes the different audience points ofview. It describes how the categories affect the selection of metricparameters and options when seeking info that serves their needs.The memo then proceeds to discuss "long-term" reportingconsiderations (e.g, days, weeks or months, as opposed to 10seconds).
